articles.author: Robyn Dixon, Rick Noack, Rachel Pannett
articles.title: Europe ramps up Ukraine crisis diplomacy amid 'extreme tension,' as Kremlin calls on West to accept its demands - The Washington Post
articles.description: French President Emmanuel Macron, after lengthy talks with Russian leader Vladimir Putin, will meet with Ukrainian President Volodymyr Zelensky on Tuesday.
articles.content: Macrons five hours of talks Monday with Russian President Vladimir Putin in the Kremlin did not defuse the crisis, but French officials told journalists there was hope for a structured dialogue with … [+5815 chars]

articles.title: Meta again threatens to pull Facebook and Instagram from Europe - The Irish Times
articles.description: Threat is outlined in technology company’s annual report
articles.content: Meta Platforms has once again threatened to pull Facebook and Instagram from Europe if it is unable to keep transferring user data back to the United States, amid negotiations between regulators to r… [+3859 chars]
